Instruction: In a saucepan, bring water or vegetable broth to a boil.
Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let it sit for 5 minutes.
Fluff the couscous with a fork and transfer it to a large bowl.
Add sliced green olives, chopped fresh parsley, chopped fresh mint leaves, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, salt, and black pepper to the couscous.
Toss gently until all ingredients are well combined.
Serve warm or at room temperature as a flavorful side dish.
